1.3.name: wordpress/beer-mapping-badge
1.3.description:
The Beer Mapping Badge Wordpress Widget

This widget allows a wordpress user to add a Badge that ties their Beer Mapping profile to their wordpress blog.

This is really only for people who are into beer or who are interested in spreading the word about good beer and good breweries.

http://beermapping.com/2007/11/25/wordpress-and-blogger-beer-mapping-widget/

Widget Options: 1. Widget Title (optional): add one or don't. This text will appear above the widget in the sidebar. 1. Beer Mapping User Name: Add your username. If you leave this blank you will see a random user everytime you load your sidebar. 1. Show User Information: this is the statistics for your account on the Beer Mapping Project.
